RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 74. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUST ADD MOONLIGHT was away alertly to set the pace while clear, then widened the margin off the turn and drew out in the stretch to prove best, driving. HAPPY TAPPY TIM was rated early, made a inside move on the turn and came three wide into the lane but failed to gain, held place award. HAPPYBIRTHDAYCOREY was allowed to settle early, dropped to the inside on the turn and finished willingly late to just miss the place award. RAIN LILLY tracked the early pace two wide, three wide on the turn and came four wide into the lane and was empty. BOUND BY TRUTH chased the pace three wide and weakened. NORA'S STAR was off slowly, failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Rain Lilly
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Nora's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Just Add Moonlight
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set unchallenged pace inside, drew off stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Tappy Tim
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, inside move, came 3 wide, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bound by Truth
ENTRY.OWNER: Stites Christine S and Stites Tracy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Happybirthdaycorey
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside 1/4 pole, willingly inside, missed 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 19900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 23 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or L ess Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUMPMASTER was well rated early, made a four wide sweep on the turn to vie for command by the quarter pole, then shook clear leaving the turn and remained clear to prove best under a confident hand ride. STRIKING MOON was off slowly, made a inside move on the turn and finished willingly but could not get to the winner while clearly second best, good effort. SPIKES SHIRL vied for the lead on the inside and then shifted out to engage with the winner but faded the final furlong, held show award. FEDERAL CASE vied for the lead in between rivals, dropped back leaving the turn and shifted out and weakened. FIELDER pressed the pace four to three wide and was in between rivals leaving the five sixteenths and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Spikes Shirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, shift out 1/4, faded 1/8, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, inside move turn, willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Federal Case
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, shifted 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Jumpmaster
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, 4 wide move, edged clear, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Fielder
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 4-3 wide, between 5/16, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 70. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mil e Or Over Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUMP FOR THE WIN stalked the early pace three wide and made a two wide bid on the turn to duel for command, then edged clear by the sixteenth marker and then held off ORASHI late to prove best, driving. ORASHI was rated along early, made a three wide move on the turn to loom boldly, then came four wide into the lane and was slowly gaining late. KAZ MUNNINGS set a pressured pace on the inside and then dueled for the lead on the inside on the turn, then faded late after a long drive. SKIMBLE SHANKS tracked the pace on the inside, then was two wide on the turn while being ridden along but lacked the needed stretch bid. COMBATING failed to menace. RISEN SAVIOR pressed the pace two wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Jump for the Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 2 wide, long drive, edged clear, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Skimble Shanks
ENTRY.OWNER: Rock Bottom Ranch and Warrior's Reward LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, 2 wide 1/4 pole, needed stretch bid

ENTRY.NAME: Orashi
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, 3 wide move, came 4 wide, slowly gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Kaz Munnings
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, dueled turn, long drive, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Risen Savior
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Combating
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 19900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 23 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or L ess Not Considered In Allowances).

CLAIM.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing

RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARTINKELLY was away alertly to be soon clear to set the pace while off the rail, then was four wide into the lane and drifted out to the six path but maintained a safe margin to the wire to prove best, driving. MR. PETE chased the early pace, between rivals on the turn, then finished well on the inside. READY AND RICH was settled back early, advanced on the inside on the turn, came three wide into the lane and rallied. DYNAMITE KARMA was reserved early, three wide on the turn, came five wide into the lane and had no serious rally. PAPA TONY chased the pace and made a mild three wide bid on the turn but was empty in the lane. BIG CITY BOB chased the pace four wide and stopped. MR. MOX tracked the pace on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Pete
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, between horses turn, finished well inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Mox
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Martinkelly
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace off rail, 4 wide into lane, kept safe

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Tony
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, mild bid 3 wide turn, empty stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Ready and Rich
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, advanced inside turn, came 3 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Dynamite Karma
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 3 wide turn, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Big City Bob
ENTRY.OWNER: Pleasant Fields at Harmony Hill LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 77. Starter Allowance Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE MARCH 23, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Si nce January 23 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BARISTA VIXEN stalked the early pace, made a three wide bid when ready on the turn to draw clear, then drew off leaving the turn and was ridden out to prove much the best. CUENCA sent to the front to set a fast pace early, headed on the turn, then dug in gamely to hold on to the place award. CAR LADY was void of early speed, advanced on the turn and came seven wide into the lane and had a belated rally to just miss the place award. EARLY FROST tracked the pace three wide, then was four wide on the turn and weakened. PSYCHE chased the pace and advanced two wide on the backstretch and then weakened. TERPEYE was reserved early, came wide into the lane and had no rally. FAVORITE DOLL was settled early, inside on the backstretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Barista Vixen
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 3 wide, drew off, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Car Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, came 7 wide upper stretch, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Cuenca
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to lead, fast pace, headed turn, held place gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Early Frost
ENTRY.OWNER: IBB Thoroughbred and Stem Brandon Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, 4 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Terpeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came wide upper stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Favorite Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside backstretch, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Psyche
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 2 wide backstretch, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 16400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 23 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VIOLENT PASS was allowed to settle early, made a inside move off the turn and inherited the lead after the leader ducked out and lost the rider, then remained clear to prove best, driving. SASSY LAD was reserved early, came three wide into the lane and rallied. MAHOMES MONEY chased the early pace, made a three wide bid on the turn and came four wide into the lane, then jumped tracked to avoid fallen rider at the three sixteenths marker, then flattened out. ACT OF VALOR dueled for the lead two wide and weakened. NAUTICAL NATURE stalked the pace four wide and stopped. SAPONARA dueled for the lead on the inside, made a bid to draw clear on the turn, then remained clear leaving the quarter pole, ducked out leaving the turn and lost the rider, walked off. The STEWARDS posted a INQUIRY concerning the run into the stretch but the race was left as is.

ENTRY.NAME: Mahomes Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, bid 3 wide turn, jumped tracks 3/16, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Saponara
ENTRY.OWNER: Club Risque Stable and Quick Gregory K
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, bid turn, drew clear, ducked out upper, lost rider

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Lad
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 3 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Violent Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside move, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Act of Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Nautical Nature
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 23. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCKIN COWBOY prompted the pace two wide, made a three wide bid off the turn and after a long drive edged clear late to prove best under a drive. WOLFINBARGER set the pace on the inside, dug in gamely in the drive but could not hold off the winner late, second best. TRUE GOLD tracked the pace on the inside, fell back on the turn and then finished willingly late to best the rest. FUTILE was reserved early, advanced on the turn and angled out five wide leaving the turn and had a belated rally on the outside. AGAINST THE ODDS chased the pace three wide, then was four wide by the quarter pole and weakened. E T'S CANDY MAN hesitated at the start, then seemed to dislike the footing and was far back early and then was eased, walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Futile
ENTRY.OWNER: FGF Stables and Come What May Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, angled out 5 wide, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: True Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, willingly, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Against the Odds
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, 4 wide 1/4 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: E T's Candy Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, far back 1/2, eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Rockin Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 2 wide, bid 3 wide, long drive, edged clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Wolfinbarger
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, dug in stretch, long drive, caught late,2nd best
